article_html:
Police line facing May Day protest in Montreal, Canada
A line of riot police is blocking a street during the annual 1 May protest in downtown Montreal. After clashes with the protesters, the police used heavy handed tactics and chemical gas to disperse the crowd, many people were incommoded including passersby and children. A few dozens arrests were made by the end of the evening, under municipal and criminal law
Photograph: Martin Ouellet/GuardianWitness
